wargear.name: The Armor of Russ
rules: The bearer has a Save characteristic of 2+ and a 4+ invulnerable save

At the start of the Fight phase, you can select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of the bearer. That unit is not eligible to fight this phase until after all eligible units from your army have done so.

psychicPowers.name: Murderous Hurricane
rules: Target enemy unit cannot fire Overwatch unless it is wholly within terrain and it fights last.

psychicPowers.name: Storm Caller
rules: Until your next psychic phase, friendly units within 6" recieve the benefits of light cover.

psychicPowers.name: Smite
rules: The closest visible enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds. If the psychic roll was 11+, the target suffers D6 mortal wounds instead.

abilities.name: (2CP) Cloaked By The Storm
abilities.rules: Psychic: If you have successfully resolved a Tempestas ability this phase, until your next psychic phase, enemies get -1 to hit for ranged attacks made to friendly units within 6" of this model.

abilities.name: (2CP) Only In Death Does Duty End
abilities.rules: Fight: If this unit has not fought this phase, upon death, it may fight after its attacker has finished making attacks.

abilities.name: Psychic Hood
rules: +1 to Deny if target is within 12"
